channel.title: ::Commands Help and more
channel.description:
Hi, basically, I've started to make my own server. I want to know three main things;
- How can I edit and create effects using the ::command thing. In other words, how would I go about making a starter kit (some armour and money) by inputting ::starter into the chat box. Also, how would I get a character to teleport by inputing ::varrock.
- How can i get the NPC's I place around the map to fight back. At the moment, when I hit them, they just curl up and die.
- How can I read and edit, mainly read the CLASS files in the Hybridscape folder.
If you could help me with this, I'd be grateful. I'm just a beginner and like all beginners I want to learn.
Syrillia. ;)

item.title: ::Commands Help and more
item.dc:creator: @digzey digzey
item.description:
@digzey wrote:

lolz? im not even answering this… in detail…
#1 in your client.java search for command.e and you can change alot there… (easy to work out…)
#2 You need to go to nc.cfg and change the npcs hp so they cant live and not die in 1hit… etc…
#3 You need a decompiler… seriously dont bother ull get ur errors anyways…

Read full topic

item.title: ::Commands Help and more
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Hi, basically, I’ve started to make my own server. I want to know three main things;

  • How can I edit and create effects using the ::command thing. In other words, how would I go about making a starter kit (some armour and money) by inputting ::starter into the chat box. Also, how would I get a character to teleport by inputing ::varrock.

  • How can i get the NPC’s I place around the map to fight back. At the moment, when I hit them, they just curl up and die.

  • How can I read and edit, mainly read the CLASS files in the Hybridscape folder.

If you could help me with this, I’d be grateful. I’m just a beginner and like all beginners I want to learn.

Syrillia.
